commitMessage:
feat: complete PM auto-update with unified adapter architecture (HODGE-045)

## What Changed
- Added GitHub Issues adapter with full comment support (github-adapter.ts)
- Fixed Linear SDK to use createComment method for rich updates
- Unified LocalPMAdapter with BasePMAdapter interface (+201 lines)
- Added ShipContext for rich PM updates with configurable verbosity
- Created comprehensive test suite (5 new test files, 7 integration tests)
- Extended PMTool type to include 'local' option
- Fixed test isolation violations - removed TEST-* directories
- Enhanced PM hooks with rich comment generation (+230 lines)

## Why This Change
The PM auto-update system needed to support multiple project management tools
with rich context updates. Previously, LocalPMAdapter was isolated from the
unified architecture, and Linear comments weren't working. This change creates
a consistent interface across all PM adapters while preserving special behaviors.

## Impact
- PM tools now receive rich updates with commit details, test results, and metrics
- LocalPMAdapter can be used as drop-in replacement through BasePMAdapter
- All adapters support configurable verbosity (minimal, essential, rich)
- Improved test isolation prevents workspace pollution
- GitHub and Linear users get automatic issue updates with ship context

## Technical Details
- LocalPMAdapter extends BasePMAdapter while preserving init() and special methods
- Serialized file operations prevent race conditions
- Constructor-based initialization ensures always-on behavior
- Test coverage includes smoke and integration tests for all adapters

Closes HODGE-045
